have y got some like it??

Wow, this is the real shiznit.  I don't know Japanese (there are no subtitles), but the point of the show is that the dad has to pick out which of the naked girls in a line-up is his daughter.  He gets to make this decision after performing various "inspections" of the girls.  Things get increasingly and awesomely fucked up as the show progresses.

Don't bitch about the file size, the movie file's 3.5 hours long.  I can't pretend to know if these girls and men are *really* related, but I swear I can see a family resemblance between some of them, so this is some hot stuff.

Thanks exmnova!
